lead_paragraph: Radko Gudas scored one of his two goals from 91 feet and added two assists, and Steve Mason made 19 saves in his return to the net in the Philadelphia Flyers' 6-0 rout of the Columbus Blue Jackets on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Gudas' 4 Points Lead Flyers to 6-0 Rout of Blue Jackets
headline.main: Gudas' 4 Points Lead Flyers to 6-0 Rout of Blue Jackets

snippet: Radko Gudas scored one of his two goals from 91 feet and added two assists, and Steve Mason made 19 saves in his return to the net in the Philadelphia Flyers' 6-0 rout of the Columbus Blue Jackets on Saturday night....
